gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hawks 130, Pistons 124
gameRecap.excerpt: Led by Trae Young's 31 points and 15 assists, the Hawks defeated the Pistons, 130-124. Young recorded his fourth straight game with 30+ points and 10+ assists. Saddiq Bey notched 21 points and four rebounds for the Hawks in the victory, while Cade Cunningham tallied a career-high 43 points, along with seven assists for the Pistons in the losing effort. The Hawks improve to 11-15 on the season, while the Pistons fall to 2-25.
